title: Slovakia
summary: Citi in Slovakia operates through Citibank Europe plc, pobočka zahraničnej banky and provides its innovative banking products and services to a broad spectrum of customers, including large corporations, global companies, domestic companies, financial institutions and public sector entities.
tag-2: Citi in Slovakia offers broad range of world-class financial solutions in corporate banking
tag-3: Citi in Slovakia operates through Citibank Europe plc, pobočka zahraničnej banky and provides its innovative banking products and services to a broad spectrum of customers, including large corporations, global companies, domestic companies, financial institutions and public sector entities.
